name: Score: New Years in Doskvol
description:
“The only time of the year Bellweather tower bells ring when someone hasn't died. What a greattime to plan a murder!”

—Ned Wells, Ink Rake journalist.

New Years in Doskvol is a starting situation for Blades in the Dark intended for a new fledgling crew to pass the time over new years. Players will select a score (Sparkcraft in Charterhall or Counterfeit Gondoliers), pick their details (Mark, Patron, and Problem) and jump right into the action!
